data.title: BBC News Ìgbò
data.description: BBC News Igbo na-agbasa akụkọ sị Naịjirịa, Afịrịka na mba ụwa niile... Ihe na-eme ugbua gbasara akụkọ, egwuregwu, ihe nkiri na ihe na-ewu ewu... BBC Nkeji.

summaries.title: DSS: Wepụ aka enwe n'ofe na Benue
summaries.description: DSS achọpụtala n'aka ndị ISS dị na mkpamkpa nke na-akpa na Naijirịa ugbua nke gosiri na ọbughị nanị ndị Fulani na-achụ ehị na-kpa arụa

summaries.title: Dịka osi ga n'ime asọmpi Premier League
summaries.description: Asọmpi Premier league ndị ụbọchị taa akwakọrọla ọnụ, a na wetara gi osi ga. ebe otu egwuregwu ndị ama ama nwetachara mmeri n'asọmpi ha.
summaries.imageAlt: Iwobi, Nacho,koscielny na Lacazette bụ ndị nyere Arsenal goolu

summaries.title: Lee ihe Barcelona mere Real Betis
summaries.description: Barcelona emerigo Real Betis na asọmpị La Liga

summaries.title: Aubameyang nwere ike ifu ndị Arsenal ọnụ ego karịrị nderi pounds iri ise
summaries.description: Agbu a ndị otu bọọlụ Arsenal na Dortmund ebidola mkparịta ụka maka azụma ahịa Aubameyang dịka ọ ga-abụ onye kacha oke ọnụ ahịa ndị Arsenal ga-azụ.
summaries.imageAlt: Aubameyang enyela ọkpụ goolu iri na atọ n'ime asọmpi iri na ise na oge a

summaries.title: "Alexis Sanchez ga-abanye Manchester united ma ọ buru na....." Wenger
summaries.description: Onye nchikwa Arsenal ,Arsene wenger ekwuola na Alexis Sanchez ga-abanye Manchester United ma ọ buru na Henrikh Mkhitaryan bata otu Arsenal
summaries.imageAlt: Alexis Sanchez gawa Manchester United,Henrikh Mkhitaryan a bata Arsenal Fc
